name: WP Server Date Time
author: Dhruwal Patel

sections.description:
This plugin is useful when you want to know what date time & timezone is it on server where wordpress is hosted if you are in other timezone.
Output looks like:

Server Date/Time: Sat 06th Dec,2008 11:17 am
Server Timezone: America/Phoenix, (MST -07:00)

Version Change log:

v0.5
Supports upto WordPress 3.7.1

v0.4
Supports upto WordPress 3.6

v0.3
Minimize css code
Supports upto WordPress 3.5.1

v0.2
Added description before date time
Added timezone information
Changed text color from red to green

v0.1
Initial release
sections.installation:
1. Upload entire wp-server-date-time directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. There is no options page, just activate and see the output on right most top corner
sections.faq:
What to do if i run in to any problem

Post a comment at http://www.dhruwal.com/wp-server-date-time/

short_description: This plugin shows the server local current date time & timezone in the upper right of your admin screen on every page.
